website_summaries.verdict: These RV tire covers stand out because of the auto-lock feature, ensuring they stay in place in heavy winds.
pros: Stays in place during the wind due to auto-lock feature
Keeps wheels cool to the touch on hot days
Comes in a variety of sizes
Durable, water resistant vinyl with UV stabilized treatment
Elastic cord with auto-lock allows easy, snug-fitting installation and wind resistance
Easy to clean – wipe only with clean water
Ideal for use on RV, motor home, Jeep, car  truck, SUV, trailer or camper!
cons: Snug fit, so measure carefully before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers are a great value. They have lasted over a year in the hot Las Vegas sun and show no signs of cracking yet. It gets very windy here but these have never blown off. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. King

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Back part comes down the tire more than most I have used. Makes it stay on tire also because of longer back part and elastic band a plus. Feels like made of good quality. Have had few months and thru high wind and heavy rain still in place, even with no extra tie downs used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Fit great! Measure FIRST before you order!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect fit for my large, 36’ horse trailer. Going to order more for my other horse trailer, just need to measure those tires first. Great quality and of course with Prime, the shipping is quick! Update: I recently bought a 2nd set of these for my other horse trailer (yes, I have 2😬). These tire covers are AWESOME!! Almost wish I had a 3rd horse trailer so I could purchase another set! You won’t be sorry with these!! They even survive the gardener when he comes around with the weed wacker!
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: These fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and the seams are well sewed. They are very easy to put on and take off. We like the grey color for our rig because the covers don’t call attention to the eye like some we have seen around. Bottom line is we’d recommend these wheel covers to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: have had 6 motorhomes and these are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality as to size, fit and materials.........have had 6 motorhomes and these are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: WildPaul

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time , well made , I was a little off on the size so I cut 2 pool noodles and put them on the top of the tire before I put the covers on and it worked great . They don’t sit on the driveway so bad .very happy . Black is the way to go they say clean .
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Gone with the Wind
customer_reviews.text: I already lost one cover do to wind, we had some strong winds and it took one of the covers off and who knows where it went. I should had returned them because there was no straps or anything else holding them on.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schapson

customer_reviews.title: No reaching behind tires to connect hooks!  Complete coverage from where the sun hits the tires.
customer_reviews.text: There are several tire covers/protectors for sale. Most have hooks to connect behind the tire to keep them from blowing off the tire. I spent a little more money to keep from having to get on my knees and lean against the tire to connect hooks behind the tire. So glad I did. These covers slip over the tires and seem to be tight enough and slip resistant, not to blow off. They also have enough material to cover the bottom front and the lower tread of the tires from the sun. As far as durability, only time will tell. They seem to be heavy material to make me believe they will last a while. I am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Size chart was super helpful and accurate. I ordered size Small for my ST205/75R14 travel trailer tires and it was a perfect fit. These covers feel extremely durable due to thickness and material. I love how easy they were to use with the elastic band rather than using a cord behind tire to secure it. Ordering the small ensured a snug (but easy to remove) fit. I will update the post at a later time when I can see just how durable they are in California’s Central Valley lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and seem heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Used on our camper. I attached elastic clips to the backside because I wasn't sure if the covers would stay on in high wind. They seem heavy duty and fit the tires perfectly. Easy to put on and look nice. Time will tell how well they hold up. Having seriously cold temps (-20 to - 25) this winter with wind chills in the - 50 range.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable but bad smell at first
customer_reviews.text: These seem very durable and I do like the quality. They fit our Jayco 224BH travel trailer perfectly. There was a really bad petroleum or plastic odor at first but it eventually went away. I like how they’re padded and have double sewn seams. I’m very surprised by the quality at this price point. Because of the smell I did initiate a return of these. After a week the smell went away so I decided to cancel the return and keep them.
customer_reviews.author: EGReviewsTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: tire covers for jeep
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure u measure correctly and add extra inches to cover. Ours are too short but will work. Didnt send them back because hubby got them dirty on the inside when putting them on....otherwise would have rated "5" for all. Our fault not sellers
customer_reviews.author: jaci

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I like that they go to the ground and I was able to place a brick on the bottom. The problem is that because they are touching the ground they got dirty and buggy. When I took them off to store them I had to hose them down because I didn't want to put them into the cargo area of my RV. It's a hassle that I'll only do if I'm not going to be using my RV for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Protect your tires from Sun & weather damage
customer_reviews.text: Since I just installed these, I can't comment on the durability, but they look to be made very well and hopefully will last at least 2-3 years. The price was very reasonable, so if you had to purchase them every few years, it is not a big deal. My camper is new, so I want my tires to be protected from the Sun's damaging rays.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K.

customer_reviews.title: Go on easy
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit reluctant to get these because they have no back strap to secure them, but no strap needed with the elastic back border and fitted design. Took me about a minute to put each one on from the front only with no crawling around. They seem to fit tight on the 25 1/4” tires I have and appear thick and durable. They should last years,.....I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: I bought these covers for 16" 235 tires and they worked like a charm. They are super easy to unpackage, the tops of the cover has elastic to help ensure a snug fit, and the bottoms of the item are squared off so they hit the ground to cover the bottom of the tire completely.
customer_reviews.author: GADawgFan75

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your expensive SUV tires
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Get these! Save your expensive SUV tires from the sun. I am a new SUV (Sequoia) owner. Had no idea the tires were so expensive. These covers fit well, are easily placed and removed — and protect your tires! I drive backwards a little once they are on. This puts the tires’ weight onto the covers — and prevents their theft.
customer_reviews.author: HA Lundeen

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The product feels like a quality item. I have 22”x12” wheels on 33”x12.50” tires and the covers fit perfect. Time will tell how long the covers will last and stay on in the wind. They fit snug and seem like they will stay on during strong winds and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: The smallz fit my 205/75-14’s like a glove. I’m excited to see how well they hold up. Standard vinyl outer layer with a fleece interior. I was and clean wheels and ib protect with 303, then let dry for a day before installing. I ordered about 5 different brands and I preferred this one the best. I also ordered in multiple sizes to see what fit best and these were spot on for my tire size.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just bought two packs of these for two boat trailers. Material feels like vinyl/fake leather and should be very water repellent. Fit is good and elastic on back is sewn in a horseshoe shape to help fit. My concern is keeping these on in high winds. I will be adding some sort of bungee or tie to ensure the covers don't disappear in a storm. Picture the ties on the back of a hospital gown - if the manufacturer would add something simple as this, it'd be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Holston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off, very durable, and fit precisely according to the chart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C

customer_reviews.title: A good deal!
customer_reviews.text: You couldn't buy the material and sew them yourself for this crazy-low price. Got'em quick, they fit perfect, look good, protecting rv tires from hot sun and cost almost nothing. What's not to like? Wish I'd bought a set long ago. Four stars for now on reliability. If they wear out, I'll get another set.
customer_reviews.author: J.Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Missing straps
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material seems good (although time will tell). Unfortunately I was disappointed that there was no back strap to ensure the cover stays on during windy conditions. It is unclear to me if the seller failed to ship them or there is a new design that doesn't have them. Prior purchasers noted there was such a strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F.

customer_reviews.title: Tire protection at its best
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and super easy to install. The back side has a built-in elastic band that wraps around the back of the tire to hold it in place. No bungee cords or draw strings to tie down. After the cover is placed on, I was still able to put my tire stabilizer between the two tires. I highly recommend these tire covers.
customer_reviews.author: HCookTexas

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Great covers! Well made, easy on and off. Look great on the van. Hopefully these will buy me extra time before tires need replacement due to UV sidewall damage from intense sun. My van tire size was borderline between two cover sixes. If a cover is too big, it is too big. If a cover is too small, it doesn't fit. I opted for the larger choice. I highly recommend. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very well pleased with these covers. Well built, quality material and I will say relatively easy to put on. My objective is to protect my vehicle tires from the hot Texas sun. They look like they will last due to the material used. A bit more expensive than the others but I'm hoping I'll get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Mr TV

customer_reviews.title: Great covers for our new trailer tires.
customer_reviews.text: I measured twice to be sure these were going to fit our trailer tires. I wasn't sure I wanted Gray, but they fit well, are relatively easy to install (we have tight fender clearance), and once the elastic cleared the back of the tires they settled into place nicely. Glad we went with the gray!
customer_reviews.author: HatsMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT your cheap, replace yearly, fabric covers. These are nice and thick and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Calicojack

customer_reviews.title: Rockwood Roo 21dk
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2017 Rockwood Roo 21dk perfectly. Be sure to measure your tires across and not go by what the measurements on the sidewalk say.
customer_reviews.author: Chambo

customer_reviews.title: Good snug fit - doesn't need a tightening cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium (Fits Tire Diameters up to M: 26''-28.75''). Fit well on my tires that measured 27.5". Literally installed them in seconds, without worry about the wind blowing them off. The bottom edge came just to the ground on my tires. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Balloonaddiction

customer_reviews.title: The value and benefit is great for any climate and weather condition
customer_reviews.text: Because of the heat here (Florida) this year, we have needed something for our vehicle tires. The life of the tires is going to be extended considerably with these covers. I was concerned that the covers might not be of the best quality given the environment here, but the durability and value of Explore Land product is excellent. Since we put them on and off every day, they needed to be the right size and shape, and these covers absolutely have lived up to our expectations. The value and benefit is great, and the delivery was on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Shook

customer_reviews.title: seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a week but the material seems good sturdy quality. My wheels are 33", I purchased the XL and they easily fit right on with a little room to spare. I was a little concerned about the slight oversize but we had a horrendous wind recently and they stayed put.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy covers at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with these covers. They are easy to install and have a nice fit...slightly taller than our tires but we just turned them under for now. The vinyl is heavy enough to protect from the sun and the felt backing makes it even better. They are not white but rather an off white color but we don't care as long as they protect the tires. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers are awesome! They really hold on to the tire with the right size. They seem very durable and are easy to put on. Exactly what I was looking for to cover my trailer tires at a reasonable price. I will update this rating if they don’t perform as expected and give an update on the life of the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: ZEichwald

customer_reviews.title: Trailer tire sun covers
customer_reviews.text: Covers are well made and I did not have to fight to get them on. My tires are ST215/75R14 Load Range D.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and great price.
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be very well made and thick. We were pleased that they are heavy weighted and fit perfectly cover all of the tire. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be pretty secure but did blow off one of my wheels during high winds. Luckily I was able to find it in the adjacent field.
customer_reviews.author: Dbsmalls

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty material, super easy to put on. These will be great for a wicked Michigan winter!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boat trailer due to a lot of sitting, weathering, and cracking over time. They fit like a glove and look nice. Not knowing how long they may last, even if just a year or two, that's a year or two of longer tire life.
customer_reviews.author: SuperGlide

customer_reviews.title: I almost deducted a point...
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be an excellent product! I used it to cover my car trailer tires. I can't see them ever blowing off like the last kind I had. The quality and fit seem excellent. I almost deducted a point because they were made in China... Boo!!! I thought at this price it wouldn't be but I sure can't complain about the quality at this point. I figure things will change after the virus with more companies pulling their operations out of there. USA is best but anywhere but China.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient tire covers
customer_reviews.text: These covers are easy to install and fit snugly on my camper tires. I didn’t rate durability but they are thicker material wise. The camper is outside all year so I’m hoping they last. If not, they weren’t too expensive so I would buy another set if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my trailer tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to protect the wheels on my boat trailer. The fit was just about perfect and will not go anywhere during periods of heavy winds. They are nice and thick and I imagine they will last for a few years. For the price, they can't be beat. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our double axle tiny house trailer. Survived a Idaho winter no problem. We even had quite a few heavy wind storms this year - one of which blew our BBQ cover clear off into the obiss, but these puppies stayed put. Would recommend and buy again for future cars/trailers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Installed in minutes. No straps!
customer_reviews.text: These installed in minutes. No straps or ties. Goes right over the top of the tire and elastic in the material holds it on. Perfect fit and much better than others I've tried and returned
customer_reviews.author: W. Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Nice find!
customer_reviews.text: I know they just cover/protect our tires, but I'm happy with the items. They seem to be of average quality, so that's fine. You shouldn't expect top quality for this price, but rest assured that they should do just fine in most climates. Be well and camp happy. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Manbearpig

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my tire size, easy to install and remove. Black color perfect for the tires, always look clean and like new. Holding great after a month of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: These fit so good on our F250 truck they look so much better then the white covers. Really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: We received these tire covers within a couple days of placing the order. They are well made and very easy to place over the tires. The quality far exceeded our expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TIRE COVERS
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Fit my Ford Explorer perfectly. Took less than 5 minutes to put them on. Flat and open on the bottom. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and They Fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It covers the tires completely and has been a life saver on these tires in the desert heat of the high plains in West Texas. We loved the fact that these were available in black. The white color available from other vendors just did not match the travel trailer. I would definitely recommend these to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: blackhawkms

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Using them for our RV. Good product for a god price. Will have to give it some time to see how sturdy they are.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E.

customer_reviews.title: Stays on !
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ! They have stayed on even with the wind we get ! They were easy to install. They seem very durable. Arrive on time, exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Just like described and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: These wheel covers are just like they described and fit perfect. They were very easy to install - just slip over tire and voila! you're done! The only down side is that they did not come with any kind of fasteners; however, they do have elastic in the back to help hold them on.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product....great price
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers went on our boat trailer. They fit perfect and am sure they will last a long time. Love the way they fit. Great product at a very good price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for H3t tires. According to advertisement recommendations on tire size, somewhat larger than the tire. They protect the tires from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Diver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Using the chart provided in this listing, I found the perfect fit cover for my trailer tires. They are easy, easy to install. We experience 40-60 mph winds here often and these covers remain on the tires without issue. I would recommend these covers for their quality and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Big Nate

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and great fit. I will be putting some grommets and a cinch line just to be sure they don’t blow away, but I do recommend these wheel covers.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I just put new tires on my camper and want to protect them from the elements. These were super easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot better than I expected. We shall see what a year of weather does to them but out of the box I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: when ordering the tire covers I used the tire size chart to take the guess work out of what size to get. The covers fit perfectly and look good. They are pretty heavy duty and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Big Tires Covered
customer_reviews.text: My husband chose these covers for his truck. The oversized tires are now protected. Since the truck must be outside, and not in the garage, these are a must. Saves those big expensive tires.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I had used the style of wheel covers before that had a drawstring in the back. These fit my tires so well that not even tornado strength winds blew them off - yet I am able to remove them with ease. Thick and durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Vincent

customer_reviews.title: They fit and they don't blow off
customer_reviews.text: Four big wind storms in the past month since putting these on and they didn't blow off. Vast improvement over the ugly white ones I had that I needed bungee chords to help hold them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great quality
customer_reviews.text: These covers are great. Surprisingly thick and look like they’re going to last for a long time. I really like the elastic around the backside of the tires which keep the covers wrapped close around the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: These feel and look better than my old ones did when they were new, and if I remember right, these are a LOT cheaper than the ones I bought at a RV store. Don’t know about durability, we’ll see—
customer_reviews.author: mike mcnierney

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Super easy to put on. Seems like they will last a few years. Not cheap looking. Did not blow off during a few storms. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTHWHILE AND LAST LONGTIME
customer_reviews.text: Great! They have terrific Longevity and wash up clean with Dawn Soap for another season of storage. (3 years so far with semi-weather protected storage)
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: A little baggy on my tires but work perfect. To keep in place with the wind around here they'll have to be held in place with some sacrificial bungee cords but much better than sidewall dry rot!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sargis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two sets, one for horse trailer and one for RV. Love how simple they are to take on and off. Excellent quality and strong material. Recommending to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Case

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I only needed two, so I sold the other two to a friend. 2 happy campers. Have only had for a few days. Ask me later how long they last
customer_reviews.author: Twink

customer_reviews.title: These hold up!
customer_reviews.text: The weather where i live is so hard on tires but these covers do such a good job at protecting them and will definitely make them last way longer
customer_reviews.author: Dawson G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit short... buy one size bigger if you are at the top of the size...but much nicer than the first ones we got. Thick
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Padley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Cover completely. Easy to put on. This is the one to buy. No more dog pee pee on tires and wheels. Best product. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 205 75R15 trailer tires like a glove and they look great. They seem like they are made from good material that should stand up to the weather but only time will tell for sure.
customer_reviews.author: D. Levy

customer_reviews.title: These run big! Although my tire was within the ...
customer_reviews.text: These run big! Although my tire was within the range listed, they swim on them, and are way too loose!
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for a Motor Home with 22" wheels. The TIRE diameter is much greater than that. I'll sell these to anyone in need for 1/2 price...$15.00
customer_reviews.author: Jim Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, seems high quality
customer_reviews.text: These look sharp and seem to stand up to the heat of summer. just hope winter rains don't cause mold.
customer_reviews.author: BusyNana

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I definitely recommend these covers🤩
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tire cover for my Camry (225x17). The fit is great! There was no rust on my break pads and no dust on my rims after it rained. Love these covers. They are well made with vinyl and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Wetlookcamry13

customer_reviews.title: Well built. Added my own grommets
customer_reviews.text: I like them! Worked perfectly for my trailer tires 225/75R15. Tough exterior, soft interior. I punched in my own grommets on lower inside corners too, so I could use bungee cords.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for my tiny house
customer_reviews.text: Our tiny house has great sun exposure but we all know that can kill tires. These fit great and the wrinkles come out of them within a day or two. So far no fading.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Good tough material and thick enough for Mn. weather - easy to instal, only took minutes - highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Van Buren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tire Covers!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Very simple to place over the tire itself. Excellent coverage and my tires stay cool and clean! Buy Eagleland tire covers immediately! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase and quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought however the material seems high quality and for out Rv tires exactly!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: First impression was WOW these are nice. Just got them and the fit perfectly over my 33x12.5x20 nitto ridge grapplers. Super happy with this buy. Not sure how long the will last. But if you ront hear back from me then you know they still good:-)
customer_reviews.author: G A

customer_reviews.title: EZ to install
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect all around tire and covers the bottom of tire ez to install
customer_reviews.author: Kibe

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable product and easy to install..I should have bought these the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Tires Are Ready For Any Weather!
customer_reviews.text: For the money hard to beat. Easy on and off. Off white...nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Value and durability
customer_reviews.text: They fit the wheels on our RV and I got four of them for the same price that a lot of other sites were selling only two.
customer_reviews.author: DI LANGHELM-STOUT

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, fit perfect and great value
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and fit perfectly. We have only used them for a couple of weeks and will see how they last over the winter, but so far they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: LLMMMS3

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tire Preservation
customer_reviews.text: Fits like they are supposed to. Helps protect the tires from the elements. Figure they will last since they appear to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: Have held up so far in near 100% sun exposure. Hope they hold up through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Thick durable material! They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for protecting your tires from the harsh sun.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Gabriel

product_meta.title: Explore Land Tire Covers 4 Pack - Tough Tire Wheel Protector for Truck, SUV, Trailer, Camper, RV - Universal Fits Tire Diameters 26-28.75 inches, Black
feature_bullets: Refer to our fitting guide picture for size selection, set of 4 covers fits entire tire diameter up to: 26''-28.75'', it’s NOT the rim size.

It's a perfect all-season cover, 4 covers in 1 set. Protects tires and wheels from sun damage, rust and dirt when your vehicle is parked. And the tire cover is easy to clean, wipe only with clean water.
Ideal for use on Jeep, car & truck, SUV, trailer, camper, motor home & RV, or anything with the correct tire size.
Durable water resistant coating with UV stabilized treatment, long-lasting and tough enough as a tire cover, bonded with soft, non-scratch backing.

Elastic cord with auto-lock design easily makes a snug-fitting installation within seconds. Our design has remarkably raised the wind resistance capacity and we don't need ties or holes anymore to stay in high wind. 3 YEAR WARRANTY.
